ext.simpleldapauth.desc: Allows authentication against a LDAP resource
ext.simpleldapauth.error.configuration: LDAP configuration error. Please contact your system administrator.
Could not authenticate credentials against LDAP domain "$1".
Could not fetch required user info to complete LDAP login.
ext.simpleldapauth.error.map.not-linking: Found local user, but can not verify match. Please login locally and match your attributes, or register a new user with matching attributes.
ext.simpleldapauth.error.map.not-creatin: Could not find local user to map to and creation is disabled.
apihelp-ext.simpleldapauth.unlink-summar: Unlink LDAP user from MediaWiki user
apihelp-ext.simpleldapauth.unlink-extend: This API can be called to unlink the LDAP <-> MediaWiki user mapping for a given LDAP user.
